profile.name: Dave Halter
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Grafana | Python Developer & Open Source Enthusiast
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with over a decade of experience in Python development, focusing on parsing, type checking, and open source contributions.
profile.company:
Based on the provided information, I would recommend the following employer for Dave Halter:

Grafana

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained the Grafana Python parser, improving performance and accuracy.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate new features and plugins.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom solutions for clients using Python, Django, and IPython.
Contributed to open-source projects, including Django and PySide.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and improved the Django project's Python API.
Collaborated with other maintainers to resolve issues and implement new features.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom solutions for clients using Python, Django, and IPython.
Contributed to open-source projects, including PySide.

experience.title: Researcher
description: Conducted research on image processing and computer vision using Python.
